game.shortDescription: • 아름다운 픽셀 아트 그래픽과 3D 환경, 최신 광원 및 비주얼 효과로 무장한 오리건 트레일이 돌아옵니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Oregon Trail is back in a beautiful blend of charming pixel art characters, 3D environments, and cutting-edge lighting and visual effects!

reviewHighlights.text: It's... mid. Like any game it has pros and cons, and unfortunately it releases a DLC instead of fixing the ugly issues. Certain items don't stack when...
Fun for a bit but full of bugs that can ruin your whole save and requires a bunch of paid DLC to get more playability
